activity_api_errors.max_registrable_time_per_activity_limit_:
You have reached the maximum time allowed for this activity.

activity_api_errors.invalid_activity_approval_state_title: Activity could not have been approved
activity_api_errors.invalid_activity_approval_state_descript: Activity may already have been approved

activity_api_errors.blocked_project_description:
You can only create, edit or delete activities after {{blockedDate}}.
Please contact the project manager to make changes to earlier dates.

projects.filter_required: It is necessary to filter by organization to obtain the projects.

project_modal.unblock_description:
Are you sure you want to unlock the project?

This will allow users to re-create, modify or delete activities associated with the project from any date.
project_modal.block_description: BLocking a project will prevent users from creating, modifying or deleting activities in that project prior to or equal to the block date.
project_modal.edit_block_description:
This project has been blocked by {{userName}} until {{blockDate}}.

Blocking a project will prevent users from creating, modifying or deleting activities in that project prior to or equal to the block date.

project_api_errors.required_role_description: Your user role does not allow you to perform this action.
